description:
-we just decided to stay an extra night at my sister's and surprise you. You can sleep over at my sister's like we planned.
-This is amazing! Amazing! This is the bestest, isn't it?
-You're awesome! Come on, you guys, let's go.
-Don't forget, we got a 10:00 flight to DC in the morning.
-Dad, don't worry. I'll be home by 8:00.
-You sure you don't want to wait for me to finish this? I think I'll survive the night. Albert and I are going to sleep.
extra
adv. 特别地，非常；另外
n. 临时演员；号外；额外的事物；上等产品
adj. 额外的，另外收费的；特大的
Police warned motorists to allow extra time to get to work.
警察告诫开车上下班的人要留出富余时间。
awesome
adj. 令人敬畏的；使人畏惧的；可怕的；极好的
Melvill called the flight "mind-blowing" and "awesome."
梅尔维尔说这次飞行令人“无比兴奋”、“棒极了”。
survive
vt. 幸存；生还；幸免于；比...活得长
vi. 幸存；活下来
He had survived heart bypass surgery.
他在心脏搭桥手术中活了下来。
sleep over
v. 借宿，在别人家里过夜；忽视
She said his friends could sleep over.
她说他的朋友们可能不回家过夜。
wait for
等候
Then, wait for them to email you.
然后，等待他们发电子邮件给你。 

- Good night. - Get some rest. The gazelle daughter remains at its father's side, seeking protection and security, for if it veers off, it becomes vulnerable to a myriad of predators.What are you doing, gazelle? Stay with your daddy. Without the parent's guidance, the offspring are at the mercy of the harsh and unforgiving animal universe. Let's watch as the cheetah rips the little gazelle's head clean off. Poor little gazelle, you should have stayed with your father.
-Can you check and see if Melanie's in the shower?
remain
vi. 保持；依然；留下；剩余；逗留；残存
n. 遗迹；剩余物，残骸
The three men remained silent.
这3个人保持沉默。
security
n. 安全；保证；证券；抵押品
adj. 安全的；保安的；保密的
They are now under a great deal of pressure to tighten their airport security.
他们目前承受着加强机场保安措施的巨大压力。
vulnerable adj. 易受攻击的，易受…的攻击；易受伤害的；有弱点的
People with high blood pressure are especially vulnerable to diabetes.
血压高的人尤其容易患糖尿病。
veer off
突然转向
If you dread what lies ahead, you may be more likely to find excuses to veer off course.
假如你害怕横在眼前的困难，你就更容易找到借口停止努力。
stay with
同…住在一起；把…坚持下去；与…并驾齐驱
I'm going to stay with my brother in his house near the sea.
我打算到海滨我哥哥家里去做客。
